cli.help.title: Orbis Prism - Tools for Hytale modding
cli.help.init_desc: Detects HytaleServer.jar and saves the configuration.
cli.help.decompile_desc: Decompiles the JAR with JADX and keeps only com.hypixel.hytale. Default: release; --all/-a: all.
cli.help.build_desc: Decompile and index (overwrites code and DB). Default: release; --all/-a: all.
cli.help.index_desc: Indexes the code into the SQLite database (FTS5). Default: release; --all/-a: all.
cli.build.success: Build completed. Code and DB updated.
cli.help.serve_desc: Starts the MCP server for AI.
cli.help.mcp_desc: Starts the MCP server for AI.
cli.init.hint_env: - Set HYTALE_JAR_PATH or use: prism config set game_path <path>
cli.init.hint_windows: - On Windows the default path is %APPDATA%\Hytale\install\...\Server. For another path: prism config set game_path <path>.
cli.init.env_jar_invalid: HYTALE_JAR_PATH is set but the file does not exist or is not a valid JAR.
cli.decompile.not_implemented: Command 'decompile' not implemented yet. See Phase 1 of the plan.
cli.decompile.no_jar: No JAR configured. Run 'prism init' or 'prism config set game_path <path>'.
cli.decompile.no_jadx: JADX not found. Install it or set jadx_path in .prism.json.
cli.decompile.prune_failed: Prune failed (com.hypixel.hytale not found in raw).
cli.decompile.may_take: (JADX may take a few seconds to start...)
cli.decompile.jadx_finished_with_errors: Warning: JADX finished with errors. Using generated output; check logs for details.
cli.prune.running: Prune: copying com.hypixel.hytale from raw to decompiled ({version})...
cli.prune.no_core: Prune: com.hypixel.hytale not found in {raw_dir}. Ensure JADX produced code (raw or raw/sources).
cli.prune.no_raw: No raw output. Run 'prism decompile' first to generate workspace/decompiled_raw.
cli.help.prune_desc: Copy only com.hypixel.hytale from decompiled_raw to decompiled. Default: release; --all/-a: all.
cli.index.not_implemented: Command 'index' not implemented yet. See Phase 2 of the plan.
cli.index.success: Indexing completed. {classes} classes, {methods} methods in workspace/db/prism_api_{version}.db.
cli.index.no_decompiled: No decompiled code found. Run 'prism decompile' first.
cli.index.db_error: Error writing database. Check permissions and disk space.
cli.query.no_db: Database for version {version} does not exist. Run 'prism index {version}' first.
cli.help.query_desc: Search the indexed DB (FTS5). Default: release.
cli.query.fts5_help: Hint: use a single word or quoted phrase. Multiple terms: term1 AND term2.
cli.serve.not_implemented: Command 'serve' not implemented yet. See Phase 3 of the plan.
cli.mcp.not_implemented: Command 'mcp' not implemented yet. See Phase 3 of the plan.
cli.mcp.instructions_title: === How to connect an MCP client (orbis-prism) ===
cli.mcp.instructions_intro: This server uses stdio transport (no port). Add this server in your client (Cursor, Claude, etc.) with:
cli.mcp.instructions_ready: Server ready. Waiting for stdio connection...
cli.help.lang_set_desc: Change the language (e.g. lang set en).
cli.help.config_set_jar_desc: Set the path: only the game root folder is needed.
cli.help.config_set_jar_hint: How to get it: Launcher -> Settings -> Open Directory -> Copy Path.
cli.config.jar_set_invalid: Path does not exist or is not a valid JAR: {path}
cli.server.list.title: Indexed server versions (* = active):
cli.server.list.none: No versions indexed. Run prism index release or prism index prerelease.
cli.server.use.invalid: Invalid version. Use release or prerelease.
cli.server.use.not_indexed: Version {version} is not indexed. Run prism index {version}.
cli.help.server_list_desc: List indexed versions and the active one.
cli.help.server_use_desc: Set the active version (release or prerelease).
cli.context.list.title: Indexed contexts (* = active):
cli.context.list.none: No contexts indexed. Run prism index release or prism index prerelease.
cli.context.use.invalid: Invalid version. Use release or prerelease.
cli.context.use.not_indexed: Context {version} is not indexed. Run prism index {version}.
cli.help.context_list_desc: List indexed contexts and the active one.
cli.help.context_use_desc: Set the active context (release or prerelease).
